summary: Comprehensive testing of CRM features: Messages, Channels, Integrations, Settings, Dashboard/Orders Filter/Export - ALL FEATURES WORKING

issues: Console warning: HTML hydration error - <span> cannot be child of <tbody>. This is a platform-level wrapper issue, not application code. Non-blocking, cosmetic only.

seed_data_creation: TEST_ prefixed data created and cleaned up during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All CRM features fully tested and working. Backend tests in /app/backend/tests/test_crm_features.py cover Messages, Channels, Integrations, Settings, and Export APIs. UI automation verified all CRUD operations work correctly.

messages_page.compose_message: PASS - Compose modal opens, recipient dropdown works, message sends successfully
messages_page.view_messages: PASS - Message list displays, clicking message shows detail panel
messages_page.mark_as_read: PASS - Clicking unread message automatically marks it as read
messages_page.delete_messages: PASS - Delete button available, API returns 200 on delete
messages_page.tabs: PASS - All, Unread, Sent tabs filter correctly

channels_page.add_channel: PASS - Add Channel modal opens, form submits successfully
channels_page.edit_channel: PASS - Edit button opens pre-filled modal, update works
channels_page.filter_by_type: PASS - Tabs filter channels by type (Direct, Retail, Online, Wholesale, Referral)

integrations_page.add_integration: PASS - Add Integration modal with type/provider selection works
integrations_page.test_integration: PASS - Test button updates status to active and records last_sync
integrations_page.toggle_status: PASS - Enable/disable buttons toggle integration status
integrations_page.delete_integration: PASS - Delete removes integration from list
integrations_page.quick_connect: PASS - Quick connect cards pre-fill modal with provider info

settings_page.company_settings: PASS - Company profile fields editable and persist
settings_page.email_notifications: PASS - Toggle switches work, changes save correctly
settings_page.payment_settings: PASS - Currency select and tax rate fields work
settings_page.notification_settings: PASS - Push, Desktop, Sound toggles work
settings_page.security_settings: PASS - Two-factor and session timeout toggles work
settings_page.export_data: PASS - Export buttons trigger file download with toast notification

dashboard_page.filter_deals: PASS - Filter button opens popover with stage options
dashboard_page.export_deals: PASS - Export button downloads deals JSON with success toast

orders_page.filter_by_priority: PASS - Filter button with priority options works
orders_page.sort_orders: PASS - Sort button with ordering options works
orders_page.export_orders: PASS - Export button downloads orders JSON with success toast
